mapper.insert: insert into ed_cert_info ( Id, processId, executor, stayExecutor, status, approvalOpinion, attachment, approvalDate, category, creater, createTime, updates, updateTime ) values ( #{Id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{executor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stayExecutor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{approvalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attachment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approvalDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updates,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.select: select * from ed_approval_record where processId = #{processId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by approvalDate DESC
mapper.delete: delete from ed_approval_record where processId = #{processId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
